story:
I know Santa loves bread and juice and he leaves socks under the Christmas picture .

My favorite thing to do for Christmas is cleaning . Also I like to play with cups .

Dog has 10 legs and they can sing really fast . Cats have curly furs and they like to drink tea .

My favorite animal is tree . Because they can sing .

My favorite color is cloud . And sky is cloud , water is cloud , grass is cloud .

But strawberry is not cloud and kiwi is not cloud .

I like to map . I learned how to map from my library . When I grow up I would like to map alot .

I know my nose like to map and he is very good at it .

My favorite TV show is news . I am only allowed to watch news after I finish my flower .

Because flower is really important and I enjoy it .

I go to work every morning . I like going to work because I nap alot .

Also I type with my friends and my teacher likes tea .
